data.name: The Misadventures of Denniz & Diana
data.detailed_description:
"The Misadventures of Denniz & Diana" is 2D-Jump'n'Run wherein the Siblings Denniz and Diana parkour and fight through a variety of areas.

Why? They were bored. Then they decided to take a trip through the forest, where they found an unusual Robot and soon discovered that NaN-City had been burnt down in their absence.

Now they follow the trail of robots and destruction to figure out who is behind this and put a stop to it.

Features!


  • Various actions, including jumps, double-jumps, wall-jumps, wall-runs, sliding, swimming and slashing enemies.
  • 5+ unlockable characters, each with their own twist.
  • 4 (?) Areas, each with their own set of levels and a boss-fight each.
  • Up to 4 Players can either work together to reach the goal or kill each other!*
  • I think there's a story?
  • Are 1-hit deaths a feature...?
  • The Normal difficulty is too boring?
  • Try Ultra Hardcore mode! Where even the first level will make you suffer!**
  • Assist Mode, in case you're bad at the game and need help.***

* Local Co-Op Only. Does not support online play.
** Try at your own risk. I'm not liable for any damage you cause due to it.
*** You surely don't need that, right?
data.about_the_game:
"The Misadventures of Denniz & Diana" is 2D-Jump'n'Run wherein the Siblings Denniz and Diana parkour and fight through a variety of areas.

Why? They were bored. Then they decided to take a trip through the forest, where they found an unusual Robot and soon discovered that NaN-City had been burnt down in their absence.

Now they follow the trail of robots and destruction to figure out who is behind this and put a stop to it.

Features!


  • Various actions, including jumps, double-jumps, wall-jumps, wall-runs, sliding, swimming and slashing enemies.
  • 5+ unlockable characters, each with their own twist.
  • 4 (?) Areas, each with their own set of levels and a boss-fight each.
  • Up to 4 Players can either work together to reach the goal or kill each other!*
  • I think there's a story?
  • Are 1-hit deaths a feature...?
  • The Normal difficulty is too boring?
  • Try Ultra Hardcore mode! Where even the first level will make you suffer!**
  • Assist Mode, in case you're bad at the game and need help.***

* Local Co-Op Only. Does not support online play.
** Try at your own risk. I'm not liable for any damage you cause due to it.
*** You surely don't need that, right?
data.short_description: The Siblings Denniz and Diana have to traverse a multitude of areas by jumping, sliding, climbing and fighting through them in this 2D-Jump'n'Run. Meanwhile, they encounter a... Mechanic-Pirate? Well, they have to stop him, whatever his plan actually is.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or equivalent
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
